content:
Samsung’s Galaxy S22 series is here. Just like the past three years, there are three models to choose from. Unlike the past three years, however, the gap that separates the highest end Ultra model from the other two devices is wider than ever. description: Interested in the Samsung Galaxy S22 series? We break down all the differences between the regular, Plus, and Ultra for you
